entries.help_button_select:
Select Button

Use this button to select the associated starship. This will then take you to another page where you can manage ship components, launch into space, or travel to another ground locations.
entries.help_stats:
Starship Information

This shows general information about the listed starship.
entries.dont_own_a_ship: You must own a ship to use this terminal.
entries.no_parking_data: Please wait for the ship parking location data to download.
